function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in transient housing","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contracting and spreading COVID-19 due to shared and transient housing arrangements","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to support stable housing for vulnerable populations and creating access to testing and healthcare","Technologies":"Social support systems, community engagement platforms, and telemedicine","People":"Individuals facing eviction and displacement, low-income communities","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infectious diseases, including respiratory illnesses and the flu","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, access to healthcare, and stable housing to reduce stress and anxiety","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, community support networks","People":"Individuals facing eviction, low-income communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lower access to COVID-19 testing post-eviction","Impact":"Reduced ability to detect and prevent the spread of COVID-19 in affected communities","Mitigation":"Increasing accessibility of testing facilities, outreach programs, and community health centers","Technologies":"Mobile testing units, community health apps, telemedicine","People":"Individuals facing eviction, low-income communities","Owner":"Health departments, community health organizations"}]}
